text:
I am a self-driven cybersecurity specialist focusing on ethical hacking and cyber defense analysis, with supporting web development skills.
I rank in the top 1% on TryHackMe and advocate for practicality in cybersecurity education, having led curriculum reform at Al Ain University.
I avoid "HR filter" certifications, focusing instead on hands-on certifications that mirror real environments.
My practical approach includes building lab environments, reporting vulnerabilities, participating in CTFs, and creating real-world security projects.
With 20+ years in the UAE, my commitment to excellence has earned me University Honor List recognition and a 10-year UAE Golden Residency Award.
